info.author: Mikhail Korobov
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Strum
=====

THIS PACKAGE IS NO READY; NOTHING TO LOOK AT

Strum is a Python package for Structured Prediction.
It aims to implement SEARN [1]_ and DAgger [2]_ algorithms.

See also: https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit

License is MIT.

.. [1] Daumé, Hal, John Langford, and Daniel Marcu.
  "Search-Based Structured Prediction."
  Machine Learning 75, no. 3 (June 2009): 297–325.
  doi:10.1007/s10994-009-5106-x.

.. [2] Ross, Stéphane, Geoffrey J. Gordon, и J. Andrew Bagnell.
  "A reduction of imitation learning and structured prediction to no-regret
  online learning." arXiv preprint arXiv:1011.0686, 2010.
  http://arxiv.org/abs/1011.0686


Install
=======

::

    pip install strum

Usage
=====

* Changelog: https://github.com/kmike/strum/blob/master/CHANGES.rst
* Source code: https://github.com/kmike/strum
* Bug tracker: https://github.com/kmike/strum/issues

Strum

THIS PACKAGE IS NO READY; NOTHING TO LOOK AT

Strum is a Python package for Structured Prediction. It aims to implement SEARN [1] and DAgger [2] algorithms.

License is MIT.

[2]Ross, Stéphane, Geoffrey J. Gordon, и J. Andrew Bagnell. “A reduction of imitation learning and structured prediction to no-regret online learning.” arXiv preprint arXiv:1011.0686, 2010. http://arxiv.org/abs/1011.0686

Install
